# <a name="add-a-birthday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="cff0e-102">在 Outlook.com 中新增生日行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-102">Add a birthday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cff0e-103">在頁面底部，選取行事曆圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="cff0e-104">[移至](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)[行事曆]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cff0e-105">在左窗格中，以滑鼠右鍵按一下 [ **生日** ]，然後選取 [ **新增生日**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-105">In the left pane, right-click **Birthdays** and select **New birthday**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cff0e-106">輸入人員的名稱和出生日期，然後選取 [ **建立**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-106">Enter the person's name and birth date, and select **Create**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="cff0e-107">選取 [ **生日** 行事曆] 以開啟和關閉提醒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-107">Select the **Birthday** calendar to toggle reminders on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cff0e-108">深入瞭解 [新增或移除生日與假期行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cff0e-108">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
